fields.name: Detonate Effect:
fields.value:
- If whoever planted this bomb played one or more other ðŸŒŠ cards alongside it, those cards' effects are doubled, and whoever detonated this draws a <:blue:1106234079055200378> and <:lightblue:1120572625865949194> card. (Any that are drawn and played after the detonation do not get doubled.)
- Otherwise, the only effect is that the person who detonated this gains one **Card Shard**.
